name: Cursor Cat
description:
Made for Mini Jame Gam #13!

Run around your desktop opening folders and fighting off a virus after you tried to download free RAM.

Yes I know you can walk off the edge I ran out of time :'( and I didn't add sound

External assets:

Folder icon: Pixel Icon Pack (Desktop) | 300+ by Voquer (itch.io)

Sword is from: RPG Items - Retro Pack by Blodyavenger (itch.io)

Font: 16bfZX by petrnita / BitFontMaker2 (pentacom.jp)

Coin: 2D Animated Coin - 2D RPK | 2D Environments | Unity Asset Store
